00046 /* USART used for SPI access */
00047 #define BSP_SPI_USART_USED  USART2          
00048 #define BSP_SPI_USART_CLK   cmuClock_USART2 
00050 /* GPIO pins used fotr SPI pins, please refer to DK user guide. */
00051 #define BSP_PORT_SPI_TX     gpioPortC       
00052 #define BSP_PIN_SPI_TX      2               
00053 #define BSP_PORT_SPI_RX     gpioPortC       
00054 #define BSP_PIN_SPI_RX      3               
00055 #define BSP_PORT_SPI_CLK    gpioPortC       
00056 #define BSP_PIN_SPI_CLK     4               
00057 #define BSP_PORT_SPI_CS     gpioPortC       
00058 #define BSP_PIN_SPI_CS      5               
00061 typedef enum
00062 {
00063   BSP_SPI_Audio,    
00064   BSP_SPI_Ethernet, 
00065   BSP_SPI_Display,  
00066   BSP_SPI_OFF,      
00067 } BSP_SpiControl_TypeDef;

00073   BSP_Init_SPI,    
00074   BSP_Init_DIRECT, 
00075   BSP_Init_OFF,

00104 /**************************************************************************/
00112 int BSP_Disable(void)
00113 {
00114   if (bspOperationMode == BSP_INIT_DK_EBI)
00115   {
00116     EbiDisable();
00117   }
00118   if (bspOperationMode == BSP_INIT_DK_SPI)
00119   {
00120     SpiBcDisable();
00121   }
00122   BSP_BusControlModeSet(BSP_BusControl_OFF);
00123 
00124   return BSP_STATUS_OK;
00125 }
00126 
00127 /**************************************************************************/
00142 int BSP_Init(uint32_t flags)
00143 {
00144   bool ret = false;
00145 
00146   if (flags & BSP_INIT_DK_EBI)
00147   {
00148     bspOperationMode = BSP_INIT_DK_EBI;
00149     BSP_BusControlModeSet(BSP_BusControl_EBI);
00150     ret = EbiInit();
00151   }
00152   if (flags & BSP_INIT_DK_SPI)
00153   {
00154     bspOperationMode = BSP_INIT_DK_SPI;
00155     BSP_BusControlModeSet(BSP_BusControl_SPI);
00156     ret = SpiInit();
00157   }
00158 
00159   if (ret == false)
00160   {
00161     /* Unable to access board control, this is an abornomal situation. */
00162     /* Try to restart kit and reprogram EFM32 with a standard example */
00163     /* as this is most likely caused by a peripheral misconfiguration. */
00164     while (1) ;
00165   }
00166 
00167   /* Inform AEM application that we are in Energy Mode 0 by default */
00168   BSP_RegisterWrite(&BC_REGISTER->EM, 0);
00169 
00170   return BSP_STATUS_OK;
00171 }
00174 /***************************************************************************/
00179 /**************************************************************************/
00187 int BSP_BusControlModeSet(BSP_BusControl_TypeDef mode)
00188 {
00189   /* Configure GPIO pins for Board Bus mode */
00190   /* Note: Inverter on GPIO lines to BC, so signals are active low */
00191   CMU_ClockEnable(cmuClock_GPIO, true);
00192 
00193   switch (mode)
00194   {
00195   case BSP_BusControl_OFF:
00196     /* Configure board for OFF mode on PB15 MCU_EBI_CONNECT */
00197     GPIO_PinModeSet(gpioPortB, 15, gpioModePushPull, 1);
00198     /* Configure board for OFF mode on PD13 MCU_SPI_CONNECT */
00199     GPIO_PinModeSet(gpioPortD, 13, gpioModePushPull, 1);
00200     break;
00201   case BSP_BusControl_DIRECT:
00202     /* Configure board for DIRECT on PB15 MCU_EBI_CONNECT */
00203     GPIO_PinModeSet(gpioPortB, 15, gpioModePushPull, 0);
00204     /* Configure board for DIRECT on PD13 MCU_SPI_CONNECT */
00205     GPIO_PinModeSet(gpioPortD, 13, gpioModePushPull, 0);
00206     break;
00207   case BSP_BusControl_SPI:
00208     /* Configure board for SPI mode on PB15 MCU_EBI_CONNECT */
00209     GPIO_PinModeSet(gpioPortB, 15, gpioModePushPull, 1);
00210     /* Configure board for SPI mode on PD13 MCU_SPI_CONNECT */
00211     GPIO_PinModeSet(gpioPortD, 13, gpioModePushPull, 0);
00212     break;
00213   case BSP_BusControl_EBI:
00214   default:
00215     /* Configure board for EBI mode on PB15 MCU_EBI_CONNECT */
00216     GPIO_PinModeSet(gpioPortB, 15, gpioModePushPull, 0);
00217     /* Configure board for EBI mode on PD13 MCU_SPI_CONNECT */
00218     GPIO_PinModeSet(gpioPortD, 13, gpioModePushPull, 1);
00219     break;
00220   }
00221   return BSP_STATUS_OK;
00222 }
00223 /**************************************************************************/
00227 uint32_t BSP_DipSwitchGet(void)
00228 {
00229   return BSP_RegisterRead(&BC_REGISTER->UIF_DIP) & 0x000f;
00230 }

00232 /**************************************************************************/
00240 int BSP_DisplayControl(BSP_Display_TypeDef option)
00241 {
00242   uint16_t tmp;
00243 
00244   switch (option)
00245   {
00246   case BSP_Display_EBI:
00247     BSP_RegisterWrite(&BC_REGISTER->ARB_CTRL, BC_ARB_CTRL_EBI);
00248     break;
00249 
00250   case BSP_Display_SPI:
00251     BSP_RegisterWrite(&BC_REGISTER->ARB_CTRL, BC_ARB_CTRL_SPI);
00252     break;
00253 
00254   case BSP_Display_BC:
00255     BSP_RegisterWrite(&BC_REGISTER->ARB_CTRL, BC_ARB_CTRL_BC);
00256     break;
00257 
00258   case BSP_Display_PowerEnable:
00259     tmp  = BSP_RegisterRead(&BC_REGISTER->DISPLAY_CTRL);
00260     tmp |= (BC_DISPLAY_CTRL_POWER_ENABLE);
00261     BSP_RegisterWrite(&BC_REGISTER->DISPLAY_CTRL, tmp);
00262     break;
00263 
00264   case BSP_Display_PowerDisable:
00265     tmp  = BSP_RegisterRead(&BC_REGISTER->DISPLAY_CTRL);
00266     tmp &= ~(BC_DISPLAY_CTRL_POWER_ENABLE);
00267     BSP_RegisterWrite(&BC_REGISTER->DISPLAY_CTRL, tmp);
00268     break;
00269 
00270   case BSP_Display_ResetAssert:
00271     tmp  = BSP_RegisterRead(&BC_REGISTER->DISPLAY_CTRL);
00272     tmp |= (BC_DISPLAY_CTRL_RESET);
00273     BSP_RegisterWrite(&BC_REGISTER->DISPLAY_CTRL, tmp);
00274     break;
00275 
00276   case BSP_Display_ResetRelease:
00277     tmp  = BSP_RegisterRead(&BC_REGISTER->DISPLAY_CTRL);
00278     tmp &= ~(BC_DISPLAY_CTRL_RESET);
00279     BSP_RegisterWrite(&BC_REGISTER->DISPLAY_CTRL, tmp);
00280     break;
00281 
00282   case BSP_Display_Mode8080:
00283     tmp  = BSP_RegisterRead(&BC_REGISTER->DISPLAY_CTRL);
00284     tmp &= ~(BC_DISPLAY_CTRL_MODE_GENERIC);
00285     BSP_RegisterWrite(&BC_REGISTER->DISPLAY_CTRL, tmp);
00286     break;
00287 
00288   case BSP_Display_ModeGeneric:
00289     tmp  = BSP_RegisterRead(&BC_REGISTER->DISPLAY_CTRL);
00290     tmp |= (BC_DISPLAY_CTRL_MODE_GENERIC);
00291     BSP_RegisterWrite(&BC_REGISTER->DISPLAY_CTRL, tmp);
00292     break;
00293 
00294   default:
00295     /* Unknown command */
00296     while (1);
00297   }
00298 
00299   return BSP_STATUS_OK;
00300 }

00312   return BSP_STATUS_OK;

00315 /**************************************************************************/
00322 int BSP_InterruptDisable(uint16_t flags)
00323 {
00324   uint16_t tmp;
00325 
00326   /* Clear flags from interrupt enable register */
00327   tmp   = BSP_RegisterRead(&BC_REGISTER->INTEN);
00328   flags = ~(flags);
00329   tmp  &= flags;
00330   BSP_RegisterWrite(&BC_REGISTER->INTEN, tmp);
00331   return BSP_STATUS_OK;
00332 }
00333 
00334 /**************************************************************************/
00341 int BSP_InterruptEnable(uint16_t flags)
00342 {
00343   uint16_t tmp;
00344 
00345   /* Add flags to interrupt enable register */
00346   tmp  = BSP_RegisterRead(&BC_REGISTER->INTEN);
00347   tmp |= flags;
00348   BSP_RegisterWrite(&BC_REGISTER->INTEN, tmp);
00349   return BSP_STATUS_OK;
00350 }
00351 
00352 /**************************************************************************/
00359 int BSP_InterruptFlagsClear(uint16_t flags)
00360 {
00361   uint16_t tmp;
00362   tmp  = BSP_RegisterRead(&BC_REGISTER->INTFLAG);
00363   tmp &= ~(flags);
00364   BSP_RegisterWrite(&BC_REGISTER->INTFLAG, tmp);
00365   return BSP_STATUS_OK;
00366 }
00367 
00368 /**************************************************************************/
00373 uint16_t BSP_InterruptFlagsGet(void)
00374 {
00375   return BSP_RegisterRead(&BC_REGISTER->INTFLAG);
00376 }

00378 /**************************************************************************/
00383 uint16_t BSP_JoystickGet(void)
00384 {
00385   return ~(BSP_RegisterRead(&BC_REGISTER->UIF_JOYSTICK)) & 0x001f;
00386 }

00388 /**************************************************************************/
00401 int BSP_PeripheralAccess(BSP_Peripheral_TypeDef perf, bool enable)
00402 {
00403   uint16_t perfControl;
00404 
00405   perfControl = BSP_RegisterRead(&BC_REGISTER->PERICON);
00406 
00407   /* Enable or disable the specificed peripheral by setting board control switch */
00408   if (enable)
00409   {
00410     switch (perf)
00411     {
00412     case BSP_RS232_SHUTDOWN:
00413       perfControl |= (1 << BC_PERICON_RS232_SHUTDOWN_SHIFT);
00414       break;
00415 
00416     case BSP_RS232_UART:
00417       perfControl &= ~(1 << BC_PERICON_RS232_SHUTDOWN_SHIFT);
00418       perfControl &= ~(1 << BC_PERICON_RS232_LEUART_SHIFT);
00419       perfControl |= (1 << BC_PERICON_RS232_UART_SHIFT);
00420       break;
00421 
00422     case BSP_RS232_LEUART:
00423       perfControl &= ~(1 << BC_PERICON_RS232_SHUTDOWN_SHIFT);
00424       perfControl &= ~(1 << BC_PERICON_RS232_UART_SHIFT);
00425       perfControl |= (1 << BC_PERICON_RS232_LEUART_SHIFT);
00426       break;
00427 
00428     case BSP_I2C:
00429       perfControl |= (1 << BC_PERICON_I2C_SHIFT);
00430       break;
00431 
00432     case BSP_ETH:
00433       /* Enable SPI interface */
00434       SpiControl(BSP_SPI_Ethernet);
00435 
00436       /* Enable Ethernet analog switches */
00437       perfControl |= (1 << BC_PERICON_I2S_ETH_SHIFT);
00438       perfControl |= (1 << BC_PERICON_I2S_ETH_SEL_SHIFT);
00439 
00440       /* Disable Analog Diff Input - pins PD0 and PD1 is shared */
00441       perfControl &= ~(1 << BC_PERICON_ANALOG_DIFF_SHIFT);
00442       /* Disable Touch Inputs - pin PD3 is shared */
00443       perfControl &= ~(1 << BC_PERICON_TOUCH_SHIFT);
00444       /* Disable Analog SE Input - pin PD2 is shared */
00445       perfControl &= ~(1 << BC_PERICON_ANALOG_SE_SHIFT);
00446       break;
00447 
00448     case BSP_I2S:
00449       /* Direct SPI interface to I2S DAC */
00450       SpiControl(BSP_SPI_Audio);
00451 
00452       /* Also make surea Audio out is connected for I2S operation */
00453       perfControl |= (1 << BC_PERICON_AUDIO_OUT_SHIFT);
00454       perfControl |= (1 << BC_PERICON_AUDIO_OUT_SEL_SHIFT);
00455       perfControl |= (1 << BC_PERICON_I2S_ETH_SHIFT);
00456       perfControl &= ~(1 << BC_PERICON_I2S_ETH_SEL_SHIFT);
00457 
00458       /* Disable Analog Diff Input - pins PD0 and PD1 is shared */
00459       perfControl &= ~(1 << BC_PERICON_ANALOG_DIFF_SHIFT);
00460       /* Disable Touch Inputs - pin PD3 is shared */
00461       perfControl &= ~(1 << BC_PERICON_TOUCH_SHIFT);
00462       /* Disable Analog SE Input - pin PD2 is shared */
00463       perfControl &= ~(1 << BC_PERICON_ANALOG_SE_SHIFT);
00464       break;
00465 
00466     case BSP_TRACE:
00467       #if defined(ETM_PRESENT)
00468         perfControl |= (1 << BC_PERICON_TRACE_SHIFT);
00469         break;
00470       #else
00471         /* TRACE is not available on EFM32G890F128, application error */
00472         while (1) ;
00473       #endif
00474 
00475     case BSP_TOUCH:
00476       perfControl |= (1 << BC_PERICON_TOUCH_SHIFT);
00477       /* Disconnect SPI switch, pin PD3 is shared */
00478       perfControl &= ~(1 << BC_PERICON_I2S_ETH_SHIFT);
00479       perfControl &= ~(1 << BC_PERICON_I2S_ETH_SEL_SHIFT);
00480       SpiControl(BSP_SPI_OFF);
00481       break;
00482 
00483     case BSP_AUDIO_IN:
00484       perfControl |= (1 << BC_PERICON_AUDIO_IN_SHIFT);
00485       break;
00486 
00487     case BSP_AUDIO_OUT:
00488       perfControl &= ~(1 << BC_PERICON_AUDIO_OUT_SEL_SHIFT);
00489       perfControl |= (1 << BC_PERICON_AUDIO_OUT_SHIFT);
00490       break;
00491 
00492     case BSP_ANALOG_DIFF:
00493       perfControl |= (1 << BC_PERICON_ANALOG_DIFF_SHIFT);
00494       /* Disconnect SPI switch, pin PD0 and PD1 is shared */
00495       perfControl &= ~(1 << BC_PERICON_I2S_ETH_SHIFT);
00496       perfControl &= ~(1 << BC_PERICON_I2S_ETH_SEL_SHIFT);
00497       SpiControl(BSP_SPI_OFF);
00498       break;
00499 
00500     case BSP_ANALOG_SE:
00501       perfControl |= (1 << BC_PERICON_ANALOG_SE_SHIFT);
00502       /* Disconnect SPI switch, pin PD2 is shared */
00503       perfControl &= ~(1 << BC_PERICON_I2S_ETH_SHIFT);
00504       perfControl &= ~(1 << BC_PERICON_I2S_ETH_SEL_SHIFT);
00505       SpiControl(BSP_SPI_OFF);
00506       break;
00507 
00508     case BSP_MICROSD:
00509       perfControl |= (1 << BC_PERICON_SPI_SHIFT);
00510       break;
00511 
00512     case BSP_TFT:
00513       /* Enable SPI to SSD2119 */
00514       SpiControl(BSP_SPI_Display);
00515       /* Enable SPI analog switch */
00516       perfControl |= (1 << BC_PERICON_I2S_ETH_SHIFT);
00517       /* Disable Analog Diff Input - pins D0 and D1 is shared */
00518       perfControl &= ~(1 << BC_PERICON_ANALOG_DIFF_SHIFT);
00519       /* Disable Touch Inputs - pin D3 is shared */
00520       perfControl &= ~(1 << BC_PERICON_TOUCH_SHIFT);
00521       /* Disable Analog SE Input - pin D2 is shared */
00522       perfControl &= ~(1 << BC_PERICON_ANALOG_SE_SHIFT);
00523       break;
00524     }
00525   }
00526   else
00527   {
00528     switch (perf)
00529     {
00530     case BSP_RS232_SHUTDOWN:
00531       perfControl &= ~(1 << BC_PERICON_RS232_SHUTDOWN_SHIFT);
00532       break;
00533 
00534     case BSP_RS232_UART:
00535       perfControl |= (1 << BC_PERICON_RS232_SHUTDOWN_SHIFT);
00536       perfControl &= ~(1 << BC_PERICON_RS232_UART_SHIFT);
00537       break;
00538 
00539     case BSP_RS232_LEUART:
00540       perfControl |= (1 << BC_PERICON_RS232_SHUTDOWN_SHIFT);
00541       perfControl &= ~(1 << BC_PERICON_RS232_LEUART_SHIFT);
00542       break;
00543 
00544     case BSP_I2C:
00545       perfControl &= ~(1 << BC_PERICON_I2C_SHIFT);
00546       break;
00547 
00548     case BSP_ETH:
00549       /* Disable SPI interface */
00550       perfControl &= ~(1 << BC_PERICON_I2S_ETH_SHIFT);
00551       perfControl &= ~(1 << BC_PERICON_I2S_ETH_SEL_SHIFT);
00552       SpiControl(BSP_SPI_OFF);
00553       break;
00554 
00555     case BSP_I2S:
00556       /* Disable SPI interface and audio out */
00557       perfControl &= ~(1 << BC_PERICON_AUDIO_OUT_SHIFT);
00558       perfControl &= ~(1 << BC_PERICON_AUDIO_OUT_SEL_SHIFT);
00559       perfControl &= ~(1 << BC_PERICON_I2S_ETH_SHIFT);
00560       perfControl &= ~(1 << BC_PERICON_I2S_ETH_SEL_SHIFT);
00561       SpiControl(BSP_SPI_OFF);
00562       break;
00563 
00564     case BSP_TRACE:
00565       #if defined(ETM_PRESENT)
00566         perfControl &= ~(1 << BC_PERICON_TRACE_SHIFT);
00567         break;
00568       #else
00569         /* TRACE is not available on EFM32G890F128, application error */
00570         while (1) ;
00571       #endif
00572 
00573     case BSP_TOUCH:
00574       perfControl &= ~(1 << BC_PERICON_TOUCH_SHIFT);
00575       break;
00576 
00577     case BSP_AUDIO_IN:
00578       perfControl &= ~(1 << BC_PERICON_AUDIO_IN_SHIFT);
00579       break;
00580 
00581     case BSP_AUDIO_OUT:
00582       perfControl &= ~(1 << BC_PERICON_AUDIO_OUT_SEL_SHIFT);
00583       perfControl &= ~(1 << BC_PERICON_AUDIO_OUT_SHIFT);
00584       break;
00585 
00586     case BSP_ANALOG_DIFF:
00587       perfControl &= ~(1 << BC_PERICON_ANALOG_DIFF_SHIFT);
00588       break;
00589 
00590     case BSP_ANALOG_SE:
00591       perfControl &= ~(1 << BC_PERICON_ANALOG_SE_SHIFT);
00592       break;
00593 
00594     case BSP_MICROSD:
00595       perfControl &= ~(1 << BC_PERICON_SPI_SHIFT);
00596       break;
00597 
00598     case BSP_TFT:
00599       /* Disable SPI interface */
00600       perfControl &= ~(1 << BC_PERICON_I2S_ETH_SHIFT);
00601       perfControl &= ~(1 << BC_PERICON_I2S_ETH_SEL_SHIFT);
00602       SpiControl(BSP_SPI_OFF);
00603       break;
00604     }
00605   }
00606   /* Write back register */
00607   BSP_RegisterWrite(&BC_REGISTER->PERICON, perfControl);
00608 
00609   return BSP_STATUS_OK;
00610 }

00612 /**************************************************************************/
00617 uint16_t BSP_PushButtonsGet(void)
00618 {
00619   return (~BSP_RegisterRead(&BC_REGISTER->UIF_PB)) & 0x000F;

00622 /**************************************************************************/
00627 uint16_t BSP_RegisterRead(volatile uint16_t *addr)
00628 {
00629   if (bspOperationMode == BSP_INIT_DK_EBI)
00630   {
00631     return *addr;
00632   }
00633   else
00634   {
00635     return SpiRegisterRead(addr);
00636   }
00637 }
00638 
00639 /**************************************************************************/
00644 int BSP_RegisterWrite(volatile uint16_t *addr, uint16_t data)
00645 {
00646   if (bspOperationMode == BSP_INIT_DK_EBI)
00647   {
00648     *addr = data;
00649   }
00650   else
00651   {
00652     SpiRegisterWrite(addr, data);
00653   }
00654   return BSP_STATUS_OK;
00655 }
00661 static void EbiDisable(void)
00662 {
00663 #if defined(_EFM32_GECKO_FAMILY)
00664   /* Configure GPIO pins as disabled */
00665   GPIO_PinModeSet(gpioPortA, 0, gpioModeDisabled, 0);
00666   GPIO_PinModeSet(gpioPortA, 1, gpioModeDisabled, 0);
00667   GPIO_PinModeSet(gpioPortA, 2, gpioModeDisabled, 0);
00668   GPIO_PinModeSet(gpioPortA, 3, gpioModeDisabled, 0);
00669   GPIO_PinModeSet(gpioPortA, 4, gpioModeDisabled, 0);
00670   GPIO_PinModeSet(gpioPortA, 5, gpioModeDisabled, 0);
00671   GPIO_PinModeSet(gpioPortA, 6, gpioModeDisabled, 0);
00672 
00673   GPIO_PinModeSet(gpioPortA, 15, gpioModeDisabled, 0);
00674 
00675   GPIO_PinModeSet(gpioPortD, 9, gpioModeDisabled, 0);
00676   GPIO_PinModeSet(gpioPortD, 10, gpioModeDisabled, 0);
00677   GPIO_PinModeSet(gpioPortD, 11, gpioModeDisabled, 0);
00678   GPIO_PinModeSet(gpioPortD, 12, gpioModeDisabled, 0);
00679 
00680   GPIO_PinModeSet(gpioPortE, 8, gpioModeDisabled, 0);
00681   GPIO_PinModeSet(gpioPortE, 9, gpioModeDisabled, 0);
00682   GPIO_PinModeSet(gpioPortE, 10, gpioModeDisabled, 0);
00683   GPIO_PinModeSet(gpioPortE, 11, gpioModeDisabled, 0);
00684   GPIO_PinModeSet(gpioPortE, 12, gpioModeDisabled, 0);
00685   GPIO_PinModeSet(gpioPortE, 13, gpioModeDisabled, 0);
00686   GPIO_PinModeSet(gpioPortE, 14, gpioModeDisabled, 0);
00687   GPIO_PinModeSet(gpioPortE, 15, gpioModeDisabled, 0);
00688 
00689   GPIO_PinModeSet(gpioPortF, 2, gpioModeDisabled, 0);
00690   GPIO_PinModeSet(gpioPortF, 3, gpioModeDisabled, 0);
00691   GPIO_PinModeSet(gpioPortF, 4, gpioModeDisabled, 0);
00692   GPIO_PinModeSet(gpioPortF, 5, gpioModeDisabled, 0);
00693 #else
00694   /* Configure GPIO pins as disabled */
00695   /* EBI AD9..15 */
00696   GPIO_PinModeSet(gpioPortA, 0, gpioModeDisabled, 0);
00697   GPIO_PinModeSet(gpioPortA, 1, gpioModeDisabled, 0);
00698   GPIO_PinModeSet(gpioPortA, 2, gpioModeDisabled, 0);
00699   GPIO_PinModeSet(gpioPortA, 3, gpioModeDisabled, 0);
00700   GPIO_PinModeSet(gpioPortA, 4, gpioModeDisabled, 0);
00701   GPIO_PinModeSet(gpioPortA, 5, gpioModeDisabled, 0);
00702   GPIO_PinModeSet(gpioPortA, 6, gpioModeDisabled, 0);
00703 
00704   /* EBI AD8 */
00705   GPIO_PinModeSet(gpioPortA, 15, gpioModeDisabled, 0);
00706 
00707   /* EBI A16-A22 */
00708   GPIO_PinModeSet(gpioPortB, 0, gpioModeDisabled, 0);
00709   GPIO_PinModeSet(gpioPortB, 1, gpioModeDisabled, 0);
00710   GPIO_PinModeSet(gpioPortB, 2, gpioModeDisabled, 0);
00711   GPIO_PinModeSet(gpioPortB, 3, gpioModeDisabled, 0);
00712   GPIO_PinModeSet(gpioPortB, 4, gpioModeDisabled, 0);
00713   GPIO_PinModeSet(gpioPortB, 5, gpioModeDisabled, 0);
00714   GPIO_PinModeSet(gpioPortB, 6, gpioModeDisabled, 0);
00715 
00716   /* EBI CS0-CS3 */
00717   GPIO_PinModeSet(gpioPortD, 9, gpioModeDisabled, 0);
00718   GPIO_PinModeSet(gpioPortD, 10, gpioModeDisabled, 0);
00719   GPIO_PinModeSet(gpioPortD, 11, gpioModeDisabled, 0);
00720   GPIO_PinModeSet(gpioPortD, 12, gpioModeDisabled, 0);
00721 
00722   /* EBI AD0..7 */
00723   GPIO_PinModeSet(gpioPortE, 8, gpioModeDisabled, 0);
00724   GPIO_PinModeSet(gpioPortE, 9, gpioModeDisabled, 0);
00725   GPIO_PinModeSet(gpioPortE, 10, gpioModeDisabled, 0);
00726   GPIO_PinModeSet(gpioPortE, 11, gpioModeDisabled, 0);
00727   GPIO_PinModeSet(gpioPortE, 12, gpioModeDisabled, 0);
00728   GPIO_PinModeSet(gpioPortE, 13, gpioModeDisabled, 0);
00729   GPIO_PinModeSet(gpioPortE, 14, gpioModeDisabled, 0);
00730   GPIO_PinModeSet(gpioPortE, 15, gpioModeDisabled, 0);
00731 
00732   /* EBI ARDY/WEN/REN/ALE */
00733   /* ARDY on Port F Pin 2 is not used                 */
00734   /* GPIO_PinModeSet(gpioPortF, 2, gpioModeDisabled, 0); */
00735   GPIO_PinModeSet(gpioPortF, 8, gpioModeDisabled, 0);
00736   GPIO_PinModeSet(gpioPortF, 9, gpioModeDisabled, 0);
00737   GPIO_PinModeSet(gpioPortC, 11, gpioModeDisabled, 0);
00738 
00739   /* EBI Byte Lane 0 support BL0/BL1 */
00740   GPIO_PinModeSet(gpioPortF, 6, gpioModeDisabled, 0);
00741   GPIO_PinModeSet(gpioPortF, 7, gpioModeDisabled, 0);
00742 #endif
00743 
00744   /* Reset EBI configuration */
00745   EBI_Disable();
00746 
00747   /* Turn off EBI clock */
00748   CMU_ClockEnable(cmuClock_EBI, false);
00749 }
00750 
00751 /**************************************************************************/
00759 static bool EbiInit(void)
00760 {
00761   EBI_Init_TypeDef ebiConfig = EBI_INIT_DEFAULT;
00762 
00763   /* Enable clocks */
00764   CMU_ClockEnable(cmuClock_EBI, true);
00765   CMU_ClockEnable(cmuClock_GPIO, true);
00766 
00767 #if defined(_EFM32_GECKO_FAMILY)
00768   /* Configure LCD_SELECT (EBI and LCD cannot be shared) */
00769   GPIO_PinModeSet(gpioPortC, 12, gpioModePushPull, 1);
00770 
00771   /* Configure GPIO pins as push pull */
00772   /* EBI AD9..15 */
00773   GPIO_PinModeSet(gpioPortA, 0, gpioModePushPull, 0);
00774   GPIO_PinModeSet(gpioPortA, 1, gpioModePushPull, 0);
00775   GPIO_PinModeSet(gpioPortA, 2, gpioModePushPull, 0);
00776   GPIO_PinModeSet(gpioPortA, 3, gpioModePushPull, 0);
00777   GPIO_PinModeSet(gpioPortA, 4, gpioModePushPull, 0);
00778   GPIO_PinModeSet(gpioPortA, 5, gpioModePushPull, 0);
00779   GPIO_PinModeSet(gpioPortA, 6, gpioModePushPull, 0);
00780 
00781   /* EBI AD8 */
00782   GPIO_PinModeSet(gpioPortA, 15, gpioModePushPull, 0);
00783 
00784   /* EBI CS0-CS3 */
00785   GPIO_PinModeSet(gpioPortD, 9, gpioModePushPull, 0);
00786   GPIO_PinModeSet(gpioPortD, 10, gpioModePushPull, 0);
00787   GPIO_PinModeSet(gpioPortD, 11, gpioModePushPull, 0);
00788   GPIO_PinModeSet(gpioPortD, 12, gpioModePushPull, 0);
00789 
00790   /* EBI AD0..7 */
00791   GPIO_PinModeSet(gpioPortE, 8, gpioModePushPull, 0);
00792   GPIO_PinModeSet(gpioPortE, 9, gpioModePushPull, 0);
00793   GPIO_PinModeSet(gpioPortE, 10, gpioModePushPull, 0);
00794   GPIO_PinModeSet(gpioPortE, 11, gpioModePushPull, 0);
00795   GPIO_PinModeSet(gpioPortE, 12, gpioModePushPull, 0);
00796   GPIO_PinModeSet(gpioPortE, 13, gpioModePushPull, 0);
00797   GPIO_PinModeSet(gpioPortE, 14, gpioModePushPull, 0);
00798   GPIO_PinModeSet(gpioPortE, 15, gpioModePushPull, 0);
00799 
00800   /* EBI ARDY/ALEN/Wen/Ren */
00801   GPIO_PinModeSet(gpioPortF, 2, gpioModePushPull, 0);
00802   GPIO_PinModeSet(gpioPortF, 3, gpioModePushPull, 0);
00803   GPIO_PinModeSet(gpioPortF, 4, gpioModePushPull, 0);
00804   GPIO_PinModeSet(gpioPortF, 5, gpioModePushPull, 0);
00805 
00806   /* Configure EBI controller, changing default values */
00807   ebiConfig.mode = ebiModeD16A16ALE;
00808 
00809   /* --------------------------------------------------------- */
00810   /* Board Control Registers, Bank 0, Base Address 0x80000000  */
00811   /* FPGA Xilinx Spartan XC6SLX9 CSG324                        */
00812   /* --------------------------------------------------------- */
00813 
00814   /* ----------------------------------------------------- */
00815   /* TFT-LCD Registers, Bank1, Base Address 0x84000000     */
00816   /* URT USMH_8252MD_320X240_RGB                           */
00817   /* Solomon Systech SSD 2119                              */
00818   /* ----------------------------------------------------- */
00819 
00820   /* ---------------------------------------------------- */
00821   /* External 4MB PSRAM, Bank 2, Base Address 0x88000000  */
00822   /* Micron MT45W2MW16PGA-70 IT, 32Mb Cellular RAM        */
00823   /* ---------------------------------------------------- */
00824 
00825   /* ----------------------------------------- */
00826   /* NOR Flash, Bank3, Base Address 0x8c000000 */
00827   /* Spansion flash S29GLxxx_FBGA              */
00828   /* ----------------------------------------- */
00829 
00830   ebiConfig.banks   = EBI_BANK0 | EBI_BANK1 | EBI_BANK2 | EBI_BANK3;
00831   ebiConfig.csLines = EBI_CS0 | EBI_CS1 | EBI_CS2 | EBI_CS3;
00832 
00833   /* Address Setup and hold time */
00834   ebiConfig.addrHoldCycles  = 3;
00835   ebiConfig.addrSetupCycles = 3;
00836 
00837   /* Read cycle times */
00838   ebiConfig.readStrobeCycles = 7;
00839   ebiConfig.readHoldCycles   = 3;
00840   ebiConfig.readSetupCycles  = 3;
00841 
00842   /* Write cycle times */
00843   ebiConfig.writeStrobeCycles = 7;
00844   ebiConfig.writeHoldCycles   = 3;
00845   ebiConfig.writeSetupCycles  = 3;
00846 
00847   /* Address Latch Enable polarity is active high */
00848   ebiConfig.alePolarity = ebiActiveHigh;
00849 
00850   /* Configure EBI */
00851   EBI_Init(&ebiConfig);
00852 
00853 #else                                         /* Giant or Leopard family. */
00854   /* Configure GPIO pins as push pull */
00855   /* EBI AD9..15 */
00856   GPIO_PinModeSet(gpioPortA, 0, gpioModePushPull, 0);
00857   GPIO_PinModeSet(gpioPortA, 1, gpioModePushPull, 0);
00858   GPIO_PinModeSet(gpioPortA, 2, gpioModePushPull, 0);
00859   GPIO_PinModeSet(gpioPortA, 3, gpioModePushPull, 0);
00860   GPIO_PinModeSet(gpioPortA, 4, gpioModePushPull, 0);
00861   GPIO_PinModeSet(gpioPortA, 5, gpioModePushPull, 0);
00862   GPIO_PinModeSet(gpioPortA, 6, gpioModePushPull, 0);
00863 
00864   /* EBI AD8 */
00865   GPIO_PinModeSet(gpioPortA, 15, gpioModePushPull, 0);
00866 
00867   /* EBI A16-A22 */
00868   GPIO_PinModeSet(gpioPortB, 0, gpioModePushPull, 0);
00869   GPIO_PinModeSet(gpioPortB, 1, gpioModePushPull, 0);
00870   GPIO_PinModeSet(gpioPortB, 2, gpioModePushPull, 0);
00871   GPIO_PinModeSet(gpioPortB, 3, gpioModePushPull, 0);
00872   GPIO_PinModeSet(gpioPortB, 4, gpioModePushPull, 0);
00873   GPIO_PinModeSet(gpioPortB, 5, gpioModePushPull, 0);
00874   GPIO_PinModeSet(gpioPortB, 6, gpioModePushPull, 0);
00875 
00876   /* EBI CS0-CS3 */
00877   GPIO_PinModeSet(gpioPortD, 9, gpioModePushPull, 1);
00878   GPIO_PinModeSet(gpioPortD, 10, gpioModePushPull, 1);
00879   GPIO_PinModeSet(gpioPortD, 11, gpioModePushPull, 1);
00880   GPIO_PinModeSet(gpioPortD, 12, gpioModePushPull, 1);
00881 
00882   /* EBI AD0..7 */
00883   GPIO_PinModeSet(gpioPortE, 8, gpioModePushPull, 0);
00884   GPIO_PinModeSet(gpioPortE, 9, gpioModePushPull, 0);
00885   GPIO_PinModeSet(gpioPortE, 10, gpioModePushPull, 0);
00886   GPIO_PinModeSet(gpioPortE, 11, gpioModePushPull, 0);
00887   GPIO_PinModeSet(gpioPortE, 12, gpioModePushPull, 0);
00888   GPIO_PinModeSet(gpioPortE, 13, gpioModePushPull, 0);
00889   GPIO_PinModeSet(gpioPortE, 14, gpioModePushPull, 0);
00890   GPIO_PinModeSet(gpioPortE, 15, gpioModePushPull, 0);
00891 
00892   /* EBI ARDY/WEN/REN/ALE */
00893   /* ARDY on Port F Pin 2 is not used                 */
00894   /* GPIO_PinModeSet(gpioPortF, 2, gpioModeInput, 0); */
00895   GPIO_PinModeSet(gpioPortF, 8, gpioModePushPull, 0);
00896   GPIO_PinModeSet(gpioPortF, 9, gpioModePushPull, 0);
00897   GPIO_PinModeSet(gpioPortC, 11, gpioModePushPull, 0);
00898 
00899   /* EBI Byte Lane 0 support BL0/BL1 */
00900   GPIO_PinModeSet(gpioPortF, 6, gpioModePushPull, 0);
00901   GPIO_PinModeSet(gpioPortF, 7, gpioModePushPull, 0);
00902 
00903   /* ---------------------------------------------------- */
00904   /* External 4MB PSRAM, Bank 2, Base Address 0x88000000  */
00905   /* Micron MT45W2MW16PGA-70 IT, 32Mb Cellular RAM        */
00906   /* ---------------------------------------------------- */
00907   ebiConfig.banks        = EBI_BANK2;
00908   ebiConfig.csLines      = EBI_CS2;
00909   ebiConfig.mode         = ebiModeD16A16ALE;
00910   ebiConfig.alePolarity  = ebiActiveHigh;
00911   ebiConfig.blEnable     = true;
00912   ebiConfig.noIdle       = true;
00913   ebiConfig.ardyEnable   = false;
00914   ebiConfig.addrHalfALE  = true;
00915   ebiConfig.readPrefetch = true;
00916   ebiConfig.aLow         = ebiALowA16;
00917   ebiConfig.aHigh        = ebiAHighA23;
00918   ebiConfig.location     = ebiLocation1;
00919 
00920   /* Address Setup and hold time */
00921   ebiConfig.addrHoldCycles  = 0;
00922   ebiConfig.addrSetupCycles = 0;
00923 
00924   /* Read cycle times */
00925   ebiConfig.readStrobeCycles = 4;
00926   ebiConfig.readHoldCycles   = 0;
00927   ebiConfig.readSetupCycles  = 0;
00928 
00929   /* Write cycle times */
00930   ebiConfig.writeStrobeCycles = 2;
00931   ebiConfig.writeHoldCycles   = 0;
00932   ebiConfig.writeSetupCycles  = 0;
00933 
00934   /* Configure EBI bank 2 - external PSRAM */
00935   EBI_Init(&ebiConfig);
00936 
00937   /* --------------------------------------------------------- */
00938   /* Board Control Registers, Bank 0, Base Address 0x80000000  */
00939   /* FPGA Xilinx Spartan XC6SLX9 CSG324                        */
00940   /* --------------------------------------------------------- */
00941   ebiConfig.banks       = EBI_BANK0;
00942   ebiConfig.csLines     = EBI_CS0;
00943   ebiConfig.mode        = ebiModeD16A16ALE;;
00944   ebiConfig.alePolarity = ebiActiveHigh;
00945   /* keep blEnable */
00946   ebiConfig.blEnable     = false;
00947   ebiConfig.addrHalfALE  = true;
00948   ebiConfig.readPrefetch = false;
00949   ebiConfig.noIdle       = true;
00950 
00951   /* keep alow/ahigh configuration */
00952   /* ebiConfig.aLow = ebiALowA0; - needs to be set for PSRAM */
00953   /* ebiConfig.aHigh = ebiAHighA0; - needs to be set for PSRAM */
00954 
00955   /* Address Setup and hold time */
00956   ebiConfig.addrHoldCycles  = 3;
00957   ebiConfig.addrSetupCycles = 3;
00958 
00959   /* Read cycle times */
00960   ebiConfig.readStrobeCycles = 7;
00961   ebiConfig.readHoldCycles   = 3;
00962   ebiConfig.readSetupCycles  = 3;
00963 
00964   /* Write cycle times */
00965   ebiConfig.writeStrobeCycles = 7;
00966   ebiConfig.writeHoldCycles   = 3;
00967   ebiConfig.writeSetupCycles  = 3;
00968 
00969   /* Configure EBI bank 0 */
00970   EBI_Init(&ebiConfig);
00971 
00972   /* ----------------------------------------------------- */
00973   /* TFT-LCD Registers, Bank1, Base Address 0x84000000     */
00974   /* URT USMH_8252MD_320X240_RGB                           */
00975   /* Solomon Systech SSD 2119                              */
00976   /* ----------------------------------------------------- */
00977   ebiConfig.banks   = EBI_BANK1;
00978   ebiConfig.csLines = EBI_CS1;
00979 
00980   /* Address Setup and hold time */
00981   ebiConfig.addrHoldCycles  = 1;
00982   ebiConfig.addrSetupCycles = 1;
00983 
00984   /* Read cycle times */
00985   ebiConfig.readStrobeCycles = 7;
00986   ebiConfig.readHoldCycles   = 3;
00987   ebiConfig.readSetupCycles  = 3;
00988 
00989   /* Write cycle times */
00990   ebiConfig.writeStrobeCycles = 2;
00991   ebiConfig.writeHoldCycles   = 1;
00992   ebiConfig.writeSetupCycles  = 1;
00993 
00994   /* Configure EBI bank 1 */
00995   EBI_Init(&ebiConfig);
00996 
00997   /* ----------------------------------------- */
00998   /* NOR Flash, Bank3, Base Address 0x8c000000 */
00999   /* Spansion flash S29GLxxx_FBGA              */
01000   /* ----------------------------------------- */
01001   ebiConfig.banks       = EBI_BANK3;
01002   ebiConfig.csLines     = EBI_CS3;
01003   ebiConfig.mode        = ebiModeD16A16ALE;;
01004   ebiConfig.alePolarity = ebiActiveHigh;
01005 
01006   /* keep blEnable */
01007   ebiConfig.blEnable     = true;
01008   ebiConfig.addrHalfALE  = true;
01009   ebiConfig.readPrefetch = false;
01010   ebiConfig.noIdle       = true;
01011 
01012   /* Address Setup and hold time */
01013   ebiConfig.addrHoldCycles  = 0;
01014   ebiConfig.addrSetupCycles = 0;
01015 
01016   /* Read cycle times */
01017   ebiConfig.readStrobeCycles = 5;
01018   ebiConfig.readHoldCycles   = 0;
01019   ebiConfig.readSetupCycles  = 0;
01020 
01021   /* Write cycle times */
01022   ebiConfig.writeStrobeCycles = 5;
01023   ebiConfig.writeHoldCycles   = 0;
01024   ebiConfig.writeSetupCycles  = 0;
01025 
01026   /* Configure EBI bank 3 */
01027   EBI_Init(&ebiConfig);
01028 
01029   /* Enable extended address range */
01030   BSP_RegisterWrite(&BC_REGISTER->EBI_CTRL, 0x0001);
01031 #endif
01032 
01033   /* Verify connectivity to Board Control registers */
01034   if (BC_REGISTER->MAGIC != 0xef32)
01035   {
01036     return false;
01037   }
01038   else
01039   {
01040     return true;
01041   }
01042 }
01043 
01044 static uint16_t SpiBcAccess(uint8_t addr, uint8_t rw, uint16_t data)
01045 {
01046   uint16_t tmp;
01047 
01048   /* Enable CS */
01049   GPIO_PinOutClear(BSP_PORT_SPI_CS, BSP_PIN_SPI_CS);
01050 
01051   /* Write SPI address MSB */
01052   USART_Tx(BSP_SPI_USART_USED, (addr & 0x3) | rw << 3);
01053   /* Just ignore data read back */
01054   USART_Rx(BSP_SPI_USART_USED);
01055 
01056   /* Write SPI address  LSB */
01057   USART_Tx(BSP_SPI_USART_USED, data & 0xFF);
01058 
01059   tmp = (uint16_t) USART_Rx(BSP_SPI_USART_USED);
01060 
01061   /* SPI data MSB */
01062   USART_Tx(BSP_SPI_USART_USED, data >> 8);
01063   tmp |= (uint16_t) USART_Rx(BSP_SPI_USART_USED) << 8;
01064 
01065   /* Disable CS */
01066   GPIO_PinOutSet(BSP_PORT_SPI_CS, BSP_PIN_SPI_CS);
01067 
01068   return tmp;
01069 }
01070 
01071 static void SpiBcDisable(void)
01072 {
01073   /* Restore and disable USART */
01074   USART_Reset(BSP_SPI_USART_USED);
01075 
01076   GPIO_PinModeSet(BSP_PORT_SPI_TX, BSP_PIN_SPI_TX, gpioModeDisabled, 0);
01077   GPIO_PinModeSet(BSP_PORT_SPI_RX, BSP_PIN_SPI_RX, gpioModeDisabled, 0);
01078   GPIO_PinModeSet(BSP_PORT_SPI_CLK, BSP_PIN_SPI_CLK, gpioModeDisabled, 0);
01079   GPIO_PinModeSet(BSP_PORT_SPI_CS, BSP_PIN_SPI_CS, gpioModeDisabled, 0);
01080 
01081   /* Disable USART clock - we can't disable GPIO or HFPER as we don't know who else
01082    * might be using it */
01083   CMU_ClockEnable(BSP_SPI_USART_CLK, false);
01084 }
01085 
01086 static void SpiBcInit(void)
01087 {
01088   USART_InitSync_TypeDef bcinit = USART_INITSYNC_DEFAULT;
01089 
01090   /* Enable module clocks */
01091   CMU_ClockEnable(BSP_SPI_USART_CLK, true);
01092 
01093   /* Configure SPI pins */
01094   GPIO_PinModeSet(BSP_PORT_SPI_TX, BSP_PIN_SPI_TX, gpioModePushPull, 0);
01095   GPIO_PinModeSet(BSP_PORT_SPI_RX, BSP_PIN_SPI_RX, gpioModeInput, 0);
01096   GPIO_PinModeSet(BSP_PORT_SPI_CLK, BSP_PIN_SPI_CLK, gpioModePushPull, 0);
01097 
01098   /* Keep CS high to not activate slave */
01099   GPIO_PinModeSet(BSP_PORT_SPI_CS, BSP_PIN_SPI_CS, gpioModePushPull, 1);
01100 
01101   /* Configure to use SPI master with manual CS */
01102   /* For now, configure SPI for worst case 48/32MHz clock in order to work */
01103   /* for all configurations. */
01104 
01105   #if defined(_EFM32_GECKO_FAMILY)
01106     bcinit.refFreq  = 32000000;
01107   #else
01108     bcinit.refFreq  = 48000000;
01109   #endif
01110   bcinit.baudrate = 7000000;
01111 
01112   /* Initialize USART */
01113   USART_InitSync(BSP_SPI_USART_USED, &bcinit);
01114 
01115   /* Enable pins at default location */
01116   BSP_SPI_USART_USED->ROUTE = USART_ROUTE_TXPEN | USART_ROUTE_RXPEN | USART_ROUTE_CLKPEN;
01117 }
01118 
01119 static void SpiControl(BSP_SpiControl_TypeDef device)
01120 {
01121   switch (device)
01122   {
01123   case BSP_SPI_Audio:
01124     BSP_RegisterWrite(&BC_REGISTER->SPI_DEMUX, BC_SPI_DEMUX_SLAVE_AUDIO);
01125     break;
01126 
01127   case BSP_SPI_Ethernet:
01128     BSP_RegisterWrite(&BC_REGISTER->SPI_DEMUX, BC_SPI_DEMUX_SLAVE_ETHERNET);
01129     break;
01130 
01131   case BSP_SPI_Display:
01132     BSP_RegisterWrite(&BC_REGISTER->SPI_DEMUX, BC_SPI_DEMUX_SLAVE_DISPLAY);
01133     break;
01134 
01135   case BSP_SPI_OFF:
01136     USART_Reset(USART1);
01137     CMU_ClockEnable(cmuClock_USART1, false);
01138     break;
01139   }
01140 }
01141 
01142 static bool SpiInit(void)
01143 {
01144   uint16_t bcMagic;
01145 
01146   /* Enable HF and GPIO clocks */
01147   CMU_ClockEnable(cmuClock_HFPER, true);
01148   CMU_ClockEnable(cmuClock_GPIO, true);
01149 
01150   SpiBcInit();
01151   /* Read "board control Magic" register to verify SPI is up and running */
01152   /*  if not FPGA is configured to be in EBI mode  */
01153   bcMagic = SpiRegisterRead(&BC_REGISTER->MAGIC);
01154   if (bcMagic != BC_MAGIC_VALUE)
01155   {
01156     return false;
01157   }
01158   else
01159   {
01160     return true;
01161   }
01162 }
01163 
01164 static uint16_t SpiRegisterRead(volatile uint16_t *addr)
01165 {
01166   uint16_t data;
01167 
01168   if (addr != lastAddr)
01169   {
01170     SpiBcAccess(0x00, 0, 0xFFFF & ((uint32_t) addr));           /* LSBs of address */
01171     SpiBcAccess(0x01, 0, 0xFF & ((uint32_t) addr >> 16));       /* MSBs of address */
01172     SpiBcAccess(0x02, 0, (0x0C000000 & (uint32_t) addr) >> 26); /* Chip select */
01173   }
01174   /* Read twice; when register address has changed we need two SPI transfer
01175    * to clock out valid data through board controller FIFOs */
01176   data     = SpiBcAccess(0x03, 1, 0);
01177   data     = SpiBcAccess(0x03, 1, 0);
01178 
01179   lastAddr = addr;
01180   return data;
01181 }
01182 
01183 static void SpiRegisterWrite(volatile uint16_t *addr, uint16_t data)
01184 {
01185   if (addr != lastAddr)
01186   {
01187     SpiBcAccess(0x00, 0, 0xFFFF & ((uint32_t) addr));           /* LSBs of address */
01188     SpiBcAccess(0x01, 0, 0xFF & ((uint32_t) addr >> 16));       /* MSBs of address */
01189     SpiBcAccess(0x02, 0, (0x0C000000 & (uint32_t) addr) >> 26); /* Chip select */
01190   }
01191   SpiBcAccess(0x03, 0, data);                                   /* Data */
01192   lastAddr = addr;
01193 }
01194 
01196 #endif  /* BSP_DK_3201 */
